title: AI Agent Chatbot
description: Implemented a RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) AI agent chatbot for FAQ policy data, enabling more intelligent and context-aware responses for user inquiries.
technicalDetails: Implemented RAG architecture for enhanced chatbot responses
Utilized LLMs for natural language understanding and generation
Integrated vector database for efficient retrieval of relevant information
Optimized response generation for accuracy and relevance
Conducted user testing to refine chatbot interactions

title: Reporting & Analytics Data Pipeline
description: Designed and implemented star schema data warehouse, developed and maintained data pipelines for reporting and analytics, and optimized SQL queries for improved performance.
technicalDetails: Designed star schema for data warehouse
Developed ETL pipelines using Google Dataflow
Optimized SQL queries for performance improvements
Integrated data from multiple sources into BigQuery
Ensured data quality and consistency across pipelines

title: Text Matching System
description: Designed and developed a text matching system that maps input text to master data for specific context cases using a dictionary-based approach with text similarity algorithms.
technicalDetails: Developed a dictionary-based text matching algorithm
Implemented text similarity algorithms for accurate mapping
Optimized performance for large datasets
Integrated with existing systems for seamless data flow
Conducted extensive testing to ensure accuracy and reliability

title: Coral Life Forms Detection
description: Bootcamp Indonesia AI Computer Vision final group project for coral object detection. Worked in a 10-member team to train and fine-tune YOLO variant models using provided datasets to achieve optimal metrics.
technicalDetails: Trained YOLO variant models on coral datasets
Fine-tuned model parameters for optimal performance
Collaborated with a team of 10 members
Achieved high accuracy and precision metrics
Presented findings and model performance in a final report

title: Item Domain System Improvement
description: Led a small backend development team working in a cross-division team to design and develop a new improved item domain system, decreasing database complexity from more than 10 relations to only 4 relations.
technicalDetails: Designed a new item domain system architecture
Reduced database complexity by simplifying relations
Implemented gRPC for efficient inter-service communication
Optimized MySQL queries for better performance
Led team in Agile development practices

title: Import Data Integration System
description: Developed a microservices system to import data from third-party APIs to database through various types of systems such as trigger, scheduler, and webhook.
technicalDetails: Designed a microservices architecture for data import
Implemented various data import methods including triggers, schedulers, and webhooks
Ensured data integrity and consistency during import processes
Optimized API calls for performance and reliability
Integrated with third-party APIs for seamless data flow
